name: Jmcv
tagline: Basic code and samples for use jMonkeyEngine and javacv.
body:
### Welcome to JMCV.

Basic code and samples for bring together [jMonkeyEngine](http://jmonkeyengine.org/) and [JavaCV](https://github.com/bytedeco/javacv).
Use case scenarios include 3D game enhancement, AR, etc.

### Sample code.

jMonkeyEngine 3.0 project jmcv01, that you will find in this repo, demonstrates how things works.
It is an AR environment composed by a 3D char having your webcam dynamic captured video as your scenario.
If you move your face to the left of a imaginary vertical line on the center of the screen, the char will dance. If you move it to the right, it will remain idle.

### Contributors.

Duodecimo Fernandes, Bruno M. Lemos, Ricardo Pereira, Robson da Rocha, Ary Amarez.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
